subject: Wanted: Owner/Developer for CpSuite
msgSnippet: Hi! Maybe some of you folks know ClasspathSuite (http://johanneslink.net/cpsuite.html) a JUnit4 extension for executing test suites in Eclipse across several
messageBody:
Hi!

Maybe some of you folks know ClasspathSuite
(http://johanneslink.net/cpsuite.html) a JUnit4 extension for
executing test suites in Eclipse across several projects - or in any
other environment across several JARs or classpaths.

Since I don't have the time anymore to maintain and enhance the
project I'm looking for someone willing to take it over. It's not much
of a code base, ie. 20+ classes including tests.

The current version does not work with JUnit 4.4, so fixing that
problem would probably be the new owner's first task. The current
license is GPL.

Anyone? I'd give support in the beginning, of course...

Johannes
